--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> "Wait a bit Nightstrike. We will have a plan for it soon." he said,
> turning his attention back to the group. "All right Astrotrain, lead 
the
> way, the Stunticons will catch up shortly." He turned to the two new
> recruits. "Show me loyalty, and you will have the universe. Come, 
after
> we show this creature to oblivion, I will give you a tour of our 
base,
> personally." he said.

::DOMNIJOE AND BLINDCHAOS::

    Domnijoe bowed respectfully to Megatron.
    "As far as I'm concerned" she said, "The Universe is not mine to 
hold..it is yours."  She chuckled. "And I would be honored to have a 
tour of the base with you."
    Blindchaos looked as giddy as a school kid on a field trip.
    "Ok.." he said, grin bright. "Lemme at the creature. I want my 
tour."
    Domnijoe sighed.
    "And this from someone who whines that they're not a warrior." she 
said.
    Blindchaos scowled more out of humor than in anger.
    "Who said I wanted to fight? I want to torture the son of a slag 
puddle." He looked at Megatron with eager, puppy-dog eyes. "Unless you 
have other plans for me, Lord Megatron."


Northlight
Domnijoe Productions

******************
